pr_title: Add young gen RCA and unit tests

timeline.message: Add young gen RCA and unit tests

timeline.bodyText: Did you mean HighHeapUsageClusterRca.class instead of HighHeapUsageOldGenRca.class?
timeline.author: ktkrg

replies.bodyText: No, I am trying to replace HighHeapUsageRca with HighHeapUsageOldGenRca because we have both young gen and old gen RCAs.Since we are adding HighHeapUsageYoungGenRca in this PR so it would be better to change the HighHeapUsageRca as well.
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.message: add license header in newly added test files
